hero.title: Elite Software Engineering & Intelligent Automation
hero.subtitle: We are not a software factory; we are your high-level tech partner. Specialists in Kotlin Multiplatform and Private Architectures for companies demanding scalability and total control.

missionVision.title: The AppToLast Standard
missionVision.subtitle: Redefining tech consultancy through code unification and data full-ownership.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To eliminate technological friction. We drive real modernization using Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP) to cut maintenance costs in half, and deploy private backend infrastructures (VPN) to give you back absolute control of your data.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: A future where AI is not a 'black box'. We integrate transparent Artificial Intelligence and vector databases on your own servers, ensuring automation works for you without compromising your privacy.

items.agile: Unification (KMP): A single codebase for iOS, Android, and Web.
items.automation: Orchestration (n8n): Automation of complex business workflows.
items.data: Own Brain: Private AIs connected to your vector data.
items.infra: Total Control: Infrastructure deployed on your own cloud or VPN.

features.title: Specialized Services
features.subtitle: We skip the generic. We focus on critical technical areas where we are undisputed authority.

multiplatform.title: Native Multiplatform Development
multiplatform.description: We create apps for iOS and Android sharing 100% of business logic. Reduce development times and bugs without sacrificing native performance.

automation.title: Automation & AI Consultancy
automation.description: We audit your manual processes and deploy autonomous AI agents working 24/7, integrating your current tools (ERP, CRM) frictionlessly.

cleanCode.title: Rescue & Refactoring
cleanCode.description: Is your current project unmaintainable? We apply Clean Architecture and SOLID principles to sanitize legacy codebases and make them scalable again.

security.title: Infrastructure & Cybersecurity
security.description: We design private cloud architectures and corporate VPNs. Protect your intellectual property and customer data with banking standards.

speed.title: Performance Audit
speed.description: We optimize slow apps and saturated servers. We improve response times to retain your users and reduce cloud costs.

services.title: Success Stories & Impact
services.subtitle: Tangible results. From startups needing speed to corporations requiring robustness.

educationalAutomation.title: Alba Academy (EdTech)
educationalAutomation.description: Complete digital transformation: Enrollment and payment automation, reducing administrative load by 70% using n8n and custom mobile apps.

mobileApps.title: IoT Ecosystems & Family
mobileApps.description: FamilyFilmApp: Private family management with real-time sync. InvernaderosAPI: Agricultural IoT control with sensor monitoring and critical alerts.

aiApis.title: AI Tools & SaaS
aiApis.description: GameChangerIA: SaaS platform generating web code via AI. FileUploadGoogle: High-concurrency microservice for massive document management.

enterpriseSolutions.title: Corporate Solutions
enterpriseSolutions.description: Control dashboards for critical servers and integration of legacy systems with modern mobile interfaces.

techFlexibility.title: Technological Adaptability
techFlexibility.description: Polyglot mastery: Rust for critical performance, Python for AI, and Kotlin for the entire application ecosystem.

team.title: Technical Leadership
team.subtitle: A senior team, no intermediaries or unnecessary managers.

alberto.bio: The visual architect. KMP specialist, breaking the barrier between operating systems by creating unified native interfaces with a single code base.

pablo.bio: The engine room engineer. Designs and manages our private infrastructure, ensuring services are fast, scalable, and invulnerable.

jesus.bio: Strategist and Industrial Systems expert. Translates complex business needs into automation workflows that save thousands of hours.

clients.title: They Trust Us
clients.subtitle: Companies that have made the leap to real efficiency.

contact.title: Let's Talk Strategy
contact.subtitle: Have a technical bottleneck or an ambitious idea? We offer a free initial feasibility consultation.

footer.slogan: Full-ownership engineering for the digital future.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: AppToLast is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website apptolast.github.io/apptolast-website/ and use our services.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and contact details when you interact with our services, for example, when you fill out a contact form or subscribe to our newsletter.

useOfInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
useOfInformation.content: The information we collect is used to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, to respond to your inquiries, and to send you updates or promotional materials. We may also use this information for internal analytics and research to enhance user experience.

informationSharing.title: Sharing Your Information
informationSharing.content: AppToLast does not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you enter, submit, or access your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites that are not operated by us. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13 without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@apptolast.com.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using AppToLast services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

services.title: Description of Services
services.content: AppToLast provides native mobile application development services, including but not limited to iOS and Android app development, enterprise solutions, and consulting services.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual.content: All intellectual property rights related to our services, including software, designs, and methodologies, remain the exclusive property of AppToLast.

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.content: Users agree not to use our services for any unlawful purpose or in any way that could harm AppToLast or its users.

limitationLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: AppToLast shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from the use of our services.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless AppToLast and its affiliates, officers, agents, and employees from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorneys' fees, made by any third party due to or arising out of your breach of these Terms of Service.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where AppToLast is headquartered, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to These Terms
changesToTerms.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page. Your continued use of the services after any such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
